## ğŸ“¥ Installation
1. **Clone the repository:**  
   ```sh
   git clone https://github.com/yassdesigndev/logProgress.git
   cd logProgress
   ```
2. **Install dependencies:**  
   ```sh
   yarn install
   ```
3. **Run the app locally:**  
   ```sh
   yarn dev
   ```
